strategy: Use a gradient-boosting ensemble (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with targeted feature selection based on mutual information to identify the most predictive passenger attributes such as class, age, gender, and fare. Apply one-hot encoding for categorical variables and normalize continuous features using min-max scaling. Perform cross-validation with stratified splits to ensure balanced training and evaluation.
